title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends his stance that Ja Morant is not a MVP caliber player in today's NBA despite his rising popularity. He believes the Cowboys made a big mistake with this move in the offseason and they will regret it. He discusses the Chiefs offense without Tyreek Hill and why they will remain among the elite teams in the NFL. Plus, longtime sportswriter and author Ian O'Connor joins the show to talk about Coach K's final season at Duke and what's made him the greatest coach in college basketball history. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
